item.title: Anna add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Anna add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Anna add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Anna add a quote by Ringo Starr
Anna add a quote by George Harrison
item.description: "It's being here now that's important. There's no past and there's no future. Time is a very misleading thing. All there is ever, is the now. We can gain experience from the past, but we can't relive it; and we can hope for the future, but we don't know if there is one." -- George Harrison

item.title: Anna add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut, Jr.
item.description: "I say in speeches that a plausible mission of artists is to make people appreciate being alive at least a little bit. I am then asked if I know of any artists who pulled that off. I reply, 'The Beatles did'." -- Kurt Vonnegut, Jr.

item.title: Anna add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "There is no greater insight into the future than recognizing...when we save our children, we save ourselves" -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Anna add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never depend upon institutions or government to solve any problem. All social movements are founded by, guided by, motivated and seen through by the passion of individuals. " -- Margaret Mead
